Climate

get_climate()

Extract climate data of TerraClimate

get_etp()

Extract evapotranspiration data of Modis

Environment

get_co()

Extract Carbon Monoxide data of Sentinel5

get_no2()

Extract Nitrogen Dioxide data of Sentinel5

get_o3()

Extract Ozone data of Sentinel5

get_so2()

Extract Ozone data of Sentinel5

get_uavi()

Extract Aerosol index (UVAI) data of Sentinel5

get_vegetation()

Extract vegetation index of MODIS

Human intervention

get_ghm()

Extract Global Human Modification data

get_pop()

Extract population data of WorldPop

get_urban()

Extract urban area data of MODIS Landcover

get_nlv1()

Extract Night time light data

get_nlv2()

Extract Night time light data

get_def()

Extract deforestation area data from Hansen

Administrative limits

import_db()

Loads district data for Perú

gen_admin.div()

Create categories for adiministrative divisions (Perú)

Graphics

lis_colors

Vector of custom colors

lis_cols()

Function to extract lis colors as hex codes

lis_pal()

Return function to interpolate a lis color palette

Vector of custom palettes

scale_color_lis()

Color scale constructor for lis colors

scale_fill_lis()

Fill scale constructor for lis colors
